docs.title: orbit project check
docs.description: Validate one or all registered projects. `orbit project check` validates local registry entries against project roots on disk. For each selected project, it verifies that the registered path exists and is a directory, that an Orbitfile exists at the project root and can be parsed, that `[project].name` in Orbitfile matches the registered project name, and that `[submit].sbatch_script` (if set) resolves to a file inside the project root.

frontMatter.title: orbit project check
frontMatter.description: Validate one or all registered projects. `orbit project check` validates local registry entries against project roots on disk. For each selected project, it verifies that the registered path exists and is a directory, that an Orbitfile exists at the project root and can be parsed, that `[project].name` in Orbitfile matches the registered project name, and that `[submit].sbatch_script` (if set) resolves to a file inside the project root.
